title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 311.1 - Funeral expenses fee schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 311.1 - Funeral expenses fee schedule

State Regulations

Reimbursement for funeral expenses or memorial services
under the Workers' Compensation Law, including but not limited to the following
items: grave sites; headstone; organist; priest, minister, rabbi or other
officiant; removal from hospital; casket; vault; chapel rental; embalming; preparation fees; hearse; cemetery fees including plot; death certificates; newspaper ad; and cremation costs, shall not exceed $ 12,5 00 in the counties
of Bronx, Kings, Nassau, New York, Queens, Richmond, Rockland, Suffolk, and

Westchester. In the remaining counties, reimbursement for such funeral expenses
shall not exceed $ 10,5 00. This fee schedule shall be applicable to deaths
occurring on or after June 8, 2016s. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
311.1

Amended

New

York State Register June 8, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 23, eff. 6/8/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
